MyBio::Data::File::GFF Tag
SummaryIncluded librariesPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
MyBio::Data::File::GFF::Tag - Object that offers a MyBio::NGS::Tag interface for MyBio::Data::File::GFF::Record
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Included modules
MyBio::Data::File::GFF::Record
Inherit
MyBio::_Initializable
Synopsis
    # Object representing a record of a gff file 

    # To initialize 
    my $gff_record_tag = MyBio::Data::File::GFF::Tag->new({
        RECORD       => undef,
        EXTRA_INFO   => undef,
    });
Description
    This object provides a MyBio::NGS::Tag interface for a record of a gff file and offers methods for accessing the different attributes.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->set_record($$data{RECORD});
}
get_chrdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_chr {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_record->get_seqname;
}
get_namedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_name {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_record->get_feature;
}
get_recorddescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_record {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{RECORD};
}
get_scoredescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_score {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_record->get_score;
}
get_startdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_start {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_record->get_start;
}
get_stopdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_stop {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_record->get_stop;
}
get_stranddescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_strand {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_record->get_strand;
}
set_recorddescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_record {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	$self->{RECORD} = $value if defined $value;
}
General documentation
EXAMPLESTop
    # Return 1 or -1 for the strand
    my $strand = $gff_record_tag->get_strand();
